selected_articles.title: 'Irredeemably corrupt': Muturi drops bombshell linking President Ruto to shady multi-billion deals
selected_articles.snippet: Former Public Service Cabinet Secretary Justin Muturi has opened Pandora's box in a damning exposé about alleged ills in President William Ruto's regime.

selected_articles.title: Muturi Accuses Ruto of Corruption in Explosive Tell-All Interview
selected_articles.snippet: NAIROBI, Kenya Apr 4 – Former Public Service Cabinet Secretary Justin Muturi has made explosive allegations against President William Ruto, accusing him of...

selected_articles.title: Golden exit: The perks awaiting Justin Muturi after dismissal from Cabinet
selected_articles.snippet: Since his retirement as Speaker, Muturi is entitled to a monthly pension equivalent to 80 percent of his last monthly salary while in office.
